author: robocopsgonemad
content: thanks! and when we talk about "May 1" we're talking about when eth/70 goes live

author: robocopsgonemad
content: per: `Clients connected on this version must not make or respond to p2p queries about block bodies or receipts before block 15537393.`

author: robocopsgonemad
content: are teams planning on ignoring these queries, or forcing a disconnect?

author: robocopsgonemad
content: does anyone else find `etha` a less-than-helpful name for a subprotocol? can we call it something like `chain` or `hist` or anything more meaningful?
